: : Darkangel : :
Darkangel: Yes. I picked up a signal, and ecided to investigate it.
He opens a comm link.
Darkangel: DeathSteel, this is Darkangel. Commander Tyrael will see you now. The computer can tell you of our location.
 Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:Tyrael turned and realized he had totally forgotten about it.
Something else tugged at his mind, though.

Tyrael: How did you meet him? You went out of the base, right?

He did not sound threatening, but rather he grinned. He suspected
Darkangel to have disobeyed his order to stay, but he made no real
case of it.

Tyrael: Tell him to come here. I'll meet him right now.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Darkangel : :
> Darkangel: Yes, right away, sir.
> Darkangel started working on a computer panel. He sent a read out to
all decks, informing them to saty clear of the plagued continent. He
then sent the armed probes to the other bases.
> Darkangel: Sir, DeathSteel is still waiting to meet you.
